ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
It has been dead for 150 million years, its' teeth are like serrated steak knives and now it's on a rampage through the cemetery! Crypt Chick and the Skeleton Man find themselves trapped between a gang of Black Market Bone Thieves and a 40 ft monstrosity! Also revealed are secrets of the Crypt Chick, here's a clue...If Rock is Dead then Crypt Chick is its' Lead Singer! Rock On with our heroes in this issue entitled " The Bone Protector".
